pkgmetadata.longdescription: Constructs Asymmetric Hidden Markov Models // Asymmetric hidden Markov model (HMM-A) learning. HMM-As are similar to regular HMMs, but use Bayesian Networks (BNs) in their emission distribution. The HMM-As can therefore offer more problem insight [Bueno et al. 2017, doi:10.1016/j.ijar.2017.05.011].
